name: Gerrit C. van der Veer
content: Gerrit van der Veer's Home Page Gerrit van der Veer's Home Page Welcome to our department! Locations When I am in the Netherlands, you will find me one day each week at the: Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam (VUA), Faculty of Sciences, Dept. Computer Science, Room 10A19, De Boelelaan 1111, 1081 HV Amsterdam, the Netherlands. My main job in the Netherlands is supervision of one PhD student at: University Twente (UT), Enschede, the Netherlands, Faculty Computer Science, Department Human-Media Interaction. I am Visiting Professor and teach various Interaction Design courses, Visual Design, Service Design, Human Information Processing, and Design for Cultural Heritage, at the Sino European Usability Center, Dalian Maritime University, China; and at: Luxun Academy of Fine Arts, Department of Multimedia and Animation, Liaoning, China. Current and Past Positions Former President (2009-2015) of ACM SIGCHI; Former President of the European Association of Cognitive Ergonomics (EACE); Representative of ACM to IFIP, and Coucillor at the IFIP Board; Honorary Member of Chi Nederland, who made me Godfather of the annual Gerrit van der Veer Prijs for best Master thesis on Human Computer Interaction. Contact e-mail should "always" work: gerrit@acm.org, and always Cc Elly, who is much more reliable that I am: h.a.lammers@vu.nl.
